00068 tapiTestSuite::tapiTestSuite()
00069   :TestSuite("TerminalAPI")
00070 {
00071   addTest( CaptionTest<Caption>::suite() );
00072   addTest( FreeLayoutTest<FreeLayout>::suite() );
00073   addTest( InfoDialogTest<InfoDialog>::suite() );
00074   addTest( LabelTest<Label>::suite() );
00075   addTest( LayoutTest<Layout>::suite() );
00076   addTest( LineEditTest<LineEdit>::suite() );
00077   addTest( ListBoxTest<ListBox>::suite() );
00078   addTest( ListBoxItemTest<ListBoxItem>::suite() );
00079   addTest( ListViewTest<ListView>::suite() );
00080   addTest( ListViewColumnTest<ListViewColumn>::suite() );
00081   addTest( ListViewItemTest<ListViewItem>::suite() );
00082   addTest( MenuTest<Menu>::suite() );
00083   addTest( MenuBarTest<MenuBar>::suite() );
00084   addTest( MenuItemTest<MenuItem>::suite() );
00085   addTest( PushButtonTest<PushButton>::suite() );
00086   addTest( ScrollingPanelTest<ScrollingPanel>::suite() );
00087   addTest( TerminalAppTest<TerminalApp>::suite() );
00088 }
